net.jawr.web.resource.handler.reader
Class ServletContextResourceReaderHandler

java.lang.Object
  net.jawr.web.resource.handler.reader.ServletContextResourceReaderHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
ResourceBrowser, ResourceReaderHandler, WorkingDirectoryLocationAware
public class ServletContextResourceReaderHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements ResourceReaderHandler

This class defines the manager for resource reader.

Author:
Ibrahim Chaehoi
